title: Tile, late 18th–early 19th century
medium: Earthenware, glazed nd high fire decorated
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Standing man, dressed in long yellow costume and blue under sleeves and belt; leaning on long stick which he holds in his right hand. Chinoiserie type of decoration.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Earthenware, glazed nd high fire decorated. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1920-15-26.
